snippet: The network plans to address the death of Cory Monteith, one of its star actors, from a drug overdose, in the third episode this season.
abstract: Fox network and producers of television series Glee say they have plan to address sudden death of one of show's stars, Cory Monteith.
lead_paragraph: The network plans to address the death of Cory Monteith, one of its star actors, from a drug overdose, in the third episode this season.

headline.main: Fox Signals How ‘Glee’  Will Handle Monteith Death
headline.print_headline: Fox Executive Discusses ‘Glee’ Response to Actor’s Death
